name: Bank Account Report
query:
SELECT
    b.party AS "Party:Data:150",
    b.account_name AS "Account Name:Data:150",
    b.bank AS "Bank:Data:150",
    b.account_type AS "Account Type:Data:120",
    b.disabled AS "Disabled:Check:80",
    b.custom_crossed_cheque_image AS "Crossed Cheque Image:Attach:150",
    b.custom_ifsc AS "IFSC:Data:120",
    b.bank_account_no AS "Bank Account No:Data:150",
    IF(b.party = b.account_name, "Match", "Mismatch") AS "Match Status:Data:100"
FROM `tabBank Account` b
ORDER BY b.account_name ASC;
